snippet: Both ribald and serious, Israel Galván’s “La Curva” show at the Schimmel Center on Thursday offered an intense reminder of flamenco’s experimental side.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews performance by flamenco dancer Israel Galvan at Pace University’s Michael Schimmel Center for the Arts; show, called La Curva, is part of the Flamenco Festival.
lead_paragraph: Both ribald and serious, Israel Galván’s “La Curva” show at the Schimmel Center on Thursday offered an intense reminder of flamenco’s experimental side.
